entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story, a student at Hogwarts.

entities.name: hannah abbott
entities.description: A classmate of Harry's who had trouble with her exam.

entities.name: iguana
entities.description: An animal that Harry was able to vanish in his practical exam.

entities.name: ferrit
entities.description: A pet of Hannah Abbott's that multiplied into a flock of flamingos.

entities.name: flamingos
entities.description: The result of Hannah Abbott's spell gone wrong.

entities.name: fanged geranium
entities.description: A plant that bit Harry during his Herbology exam.
